short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Curate your LinkedIn feed: Build custom lists of people, browse, and engage with their posts â€” all at one convenient place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop wasting time scrolling through irrelevant posts. With Dexra, you can build custom lists of people on LinkedIn, allowing you to focus on meaningful interactions. Easily engage with purpose by browsing and responding to posts from your curated lists, ensuring you never miss important updates. Dexra integrates seamlessly with LinkedIn, displaying posts natively on the platform - guaranteeing 100% safety. 

Stay organized, enhance your productivity, and make every interaction count with your personalized LinkedIn feed.
